title: Problem-Based Learning (PBL)-Driven Science Inquiry Process for Novice Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory and experience with experimental tools
context.additional_context: A systematic analysis and feedback process for problem-solving in mobile learning environments utilizing personal devices (BYOD), supported by formative assessment for continuous learning improvement.

learning_goals: Learners can apply strategies for solving given scientific problems with structural/analytical approaches at over 80% accuracy
Learners can document trial-and-error processes from problem-solving in reflection journals and propose three or more improvement plans
Learners can revise problem-solving approaches based on peer feedback to derive a final executable solution with 90% completion.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
